content: 9 times around the sock chart stitch symbols 2 written instructions for the chart continue knitting following the chart until you reach your desired length for the leg i recommend between 14-17 cm / 5 5 6 5 inch end after round 6 or 12 of the chart heel you can knit any type of heel you prefer just make sure you start the round with the top of the foot and start the heel after you followed the chart for 28 32 36 stitches measurements for the length of the foot are provided below the heel will be worked in row back and forth row 1 rs knit 28 32 36 stitches following the chart top of the foot then knit 28 32 36 stitches in stockinette use two stitch markers and divide the stitches into three equal parts 10/8/10 11/10/11 12/10/12 the markers stay in place and will simply be slipped as you knit across them turn work row 2 ws make one double stitch mds and purl across row 3 rs mds then knit across to right before the double stitch do not knit the double stitch turn work row 4 ws mds then purl across to right before the double stitch do not knit the double stitch turn work repeat row 3+4 until you have turned all stitches on the left and right sections from the markers into double stitches 8 10 10 knit stitches between the stitch markers remain work in the round over all stitches for 2 rounds knit the double stitches together as one stitch continue following the chart over the 28 32 36 stitches for the top of the foot and knit all over the remaining 28 32 36 stitches slipping all markers be careful when you knit the double stitches they easily slide off your needles end your 2 rounds at the second stitch marker and continue working flat 3 row 1 rs remove the marker knit one more stitch and turn work row 2 ws mds purl to the second marker remove marker purl one more stitch and turn work row 3 rs mds knit until the double stitch knit the double stitch knit one more stitch and turn work row 4 ws mds purl until the double stitch purl the double stitch purl one more stitch and turn around repeat row 3+4 until you have made a double stitch on the first and last stitch of this section knit the remaining double stitch as one stitch in the next round foot continue working in the round k28 32 36 stitches following the chart top of the foot k the rest of the stitches in stockinette bottom of the foot until end of round continue as such until you reach the desired length for your size end after round 6 or 12 of the chart if possible standard measurements from the heel to the beginning of the toe sizes 36/37 38/39 40/41 42/43 length in cm 18 5 20 21
